description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. What reviewers wrote: "Megalopolis offers fast-paced and simple city-building strategy that you could lose hours to", "This week’s game of the week medal is proudly worn by Megalopolis", "Interesting city-builiding game. Very nice presentation and it has a great tutorial", "You do not really get a feel for the game from the trial so be sure to try it a couple of times because it is a decent game"
